values.ctor:
<init>(message: String!, locator: Locator!)
            Create a new SAXParseException from a message and a Locator.

<init>(message: String!, locator: Locator!, e: Exception!)
            Wrap an existing exception in a SAXParseException.

<init>(message: String!, publicId: String!, systemId: String!, lineNumber: Int, columnNumber: Int)
            Create a new SAXParseException.

<init>(message: String!, publicId: String!, systemId: String!, lineNumber: Int, columnNumber: Int, e: Exception!)
            Create a new SAXParseException with an embedded exception.
